name: REBIDENT EBIL: THE GAME
description:
Based on the animated parody by PhantomArcade
http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/692601

Made in like 3 days or something

Controls: 
Tap Z to smack the wall
Tap X to run

Other Controls:
S to switch between Gameboy colors and full color
A to toggle antialiasing(kinda makes it gross and blurred a smidge but hey if thats your thing go for it girl)
- and + to change the volume. 0 to mute!
------
STORY
Bust Jill out of the spooky mansion before the bad zombie eats her up! Uh oh Jill! Stop being so tasty! Rated E for Everyone. Patent Pending™
FEATURING STEREO SOUND!
------
